Accomplishments

Awards

  1. 2021 3rd Prize for the Stanbic Bank and Hacklab Foundation AI Hackathon – Developed a machine learning model to predict and automate mortgage loans appraisal and approval process.

  4. 2020 Google Africa Developer Scholarship Recipient - pursued the Google Cloud Engineer certification

  6. 2019 Financial Aid to pursue Financial Regulation in Emerging Markets and the Rise of FinTechs – University of Cape Town through Coursera
  7. 2019 Chosen among the top highest performers in the Data Science programme by i2i under the DataHack4FI Competition
  8. 2014 Delegate at the African Union Model Summit, hosted by the University of Namibia. A leadership simulation of the African Union Summit
  9. 2017 Gapminder - Global facts certificate – for 100% correct answers on the Gapminder test 2017
